price: 26. C’est qu’ils ont dit à ceux qui ont pris en aversion la révélation d’Allah : « Nous vous obéirons pour certaines choses. » Mais Allah Sait bien ce qu’ils tiennent secret.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُواْ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي بَعۡضِ ٱلۡأَمۡرِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِسۡرَارَهُمۡ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum qālū lilladhīna karihū mā nazzala al-lahu sanuṭīʿukum fī baʿḍi al-amri wal-lahu yaʿlamu is'rārahum
